info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chesterfield, north central Amelia and southern Powhatan Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Macon, or near Powhatan, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chula around 315 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Goodwins Store, Flat Rock, Pilkinton, Giles Mill, Winterham, Skinquarter, Belona, Holly Hills, Lodore and Truxillo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
